title: Siege of Talonrend
description: A river, a handful of farming villages, and a few miles of open plains are all that separate the frontier city of Talonrend from the wilderness that lies in the shadow of Kanebullar Mountain, the home of the goblins. King Lucius Firesbane has disappeared without an heir and goblins have been seen on the horizon. In the face of chaos, a disgruntled paladin sets out to find his king.
author: Stuart Thaman
